description: Try our easy to follow Roast Lamb Rack With Mint Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Lamb Rack With Mint Salsa
name: Roast Lamb Rack With Mint Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook beans in boiling water for 2 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Divide lamb and serve with mint salsa and vegetables.
